turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get a Caramel Frapp.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 Caramel Frapp, which coffee shop is this from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want extra caramel this time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks on Airport, 1 venti Caramel Frapp no whip. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything else? A cookie or pastery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can get chocolate shavings on your frapps now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh that sound good, yes add those to the drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope that is it, make sure to order you one as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been confirmed by the Starbucks on Airport and is being made.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You should receive the receipt by text messages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can do for you at the moment?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is it, have a pleasant lunch.
